text: Ivan Koloff (born Oreal Perras; August 25, 1942 - February 18, 2017) was a Canadian professional wrestler. He was also called "The Russian Bear". He was best known for once holding the WWWF World Heavyweight Championship. He wrestled between 1961 and 1994. He was born in Montreal, Quebec. Koloff died from liver cancer on February 18, 2017 in Winterville, North Carolina. He was 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1942 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Canadian professional wrestlers Category:Cancer deaths in North Carolina Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:Professional wrestling managers and valets Category:Sportspeople from Montreal
title: Ivan Koloff
